alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Sussex and south central Kent Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Federalsburg to near Sharptown. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Seaford, Laurel, Milton, Bridgeville, Delmar, Ellendale, Sycamore, Blades, Greenwood, Bethel and Farmington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and southern Delaware...and eastern Maryland.
